"【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, if there is no character facing this card, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 If this card would attack, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's back stage, and this card frontal attacks that character as the defending character instead.""

name: #Pekorart, Usada Pekora
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《hololive》, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Hoshimachi Suisei
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《hololive》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: #Shishirart, Shishiro Botan
text: 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if there is a card in your memory, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Peaceful Moment" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《hololive》 characters, search your deck for up to 2 《hololive》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put up to 1 of them into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.

name: Minato Aqua
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: #LamyArt, Yukihana Lamy
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more cards with different card names, this card gets +1500 power, 《Liquor》, and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: #ShionDrawings, Murasaki Shion
text: 【CONT】 Experience If "Towards the Future Together, Minato Aqua" is in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Shion's Birthday" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 4 《hololive》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Usada Pekora
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《hololive》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

If you do, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock.

name: Murasaki Shion
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《hololive》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm Yamada, and this is all kinda new to me.

name: An Expert's Power, Murasaki Shion
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: To that end, I had Rushia-sensei come over. She's an expert in death and reanimation.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《hololive》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.

name: Peaceful Times, Uruha Rushia
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《hololive》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Always Together" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《hololive》 character, choose up to 1 《hololive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it on any position of your stage. If you returned a character to your hand, choose up to 4 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck. If you placed a character on your stage, that character gets +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
